title: Understanding Reinforcers
text: Reinforcers are stimuli that increase the likelihood of a behavior being repeated. In the context of Brian, think about what he might use to encourage positive behavior.

title: Types of Reinforcers
text: Reinforcers can be tangible items, activities, or even social interactions. Consider what Brian might have readily available to use as a reinforcer.

title: Identifying the Correct Reinforcer
text: Among the options provided, which one is most likely to be used as a quick and effective reinforcer by Brian?
